data.title: Beaufort County Government
data.meta_description: Beaufort County, SC - Beaufort County Government
data.text:
The Propertymax property information site is hosted by a third party vendor. You are leaving the main Beaufort County Government website.

KEEP BEAUFORT COUNTY BEAUTIFUL

Through partnerships and strategic alliances with citizens, businesses, and government, Keep Beaufort County Beautiful's programs motivate volunteers to clean up, beautify, and improve our neighborhoods, thereby creating healthier, safer, and livable community environments.

Learn More

Hilton Head Island Airport Upgrade

A new terminal will provide comfort, convenience, and a first-class experience that our travelers deserve and expect when flying to Hilton Head.

Learn More

See a Problem? Report it!

The Beaufort County Connect mobile app allows citizens to submit non-emergency requests directly to various county departments and receive notifications, status updates and comments in real time from county personnel. Beaufort County Connect users will now have access to multiple new request forms as well as other Beaufort County links and features like Traffic Cameras, GIS and News and Information. Users can submit requests or issues to Stormwater, Public Works, Litter Control, Traffic Engineering, Animal Control, Mosquito Control, Code Enforcement, and Facility Management.

Beaufort County

Beaufort County government exists to serve the people of Beaufort County in a cost-effective manner, so all our citizens may enjoy and appreciate a protected quality of life, natural and developed resources in a coastal environment, a diverse heritage, and economic well-being.
